topic.title: 5249.403 Termination of cost-reimbursement contracts for default.

body.p: (a) Within five (5) calendar days after issuing the notice of the termination or a change in termination status, submit a copy of the FAPIIS entry required by FAR 42.1503(h)(1)(iii), including changes in status of terminations, to the AGC (AI) by email at aio@navy.mil with the subject "FAR 49.402-8 - T4D" followed by the contract number.
